Synthesis Method: Induction furnace melting at 1300 °C under Ar, cast in Cu mold.
Key Findings: Elastic modulus ~198 GPa (163–229 GPa) and Young’s modulus 269 GPa; storage capacity 1.68 wt% at 25 °C.; Sample subjected to compression up to 668 MPa showing damage; DIC used for strain measurement.; Mean indentation elastic modulus 294 ± 60 GPa; domain-specific values up to 384 ± 32 GPa.
Comments: Ti‑Fe‑Mn intermetallic used in industrial storage tanks.; Mechanical heterogeneity observed across microstructural domains.
